item.title: First post
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.

item.title: About me
item.description: Biography My name is Ruidong Li, a Bioinformatics Research Scientist at Gilead Sciences, Inc. in the Bay Area in California, USA. Before joining Gilead, I studied in the Genetics, Genomics, and Bioinformatics (GGB) Program at Univeristy of California, Riverside (UCR) for the Ph.D. degree of Bioinformatics (2013-2018) and in the Institute of Genetics and Developmental Biology (IGDB), Chinese Academy of Sciences (CAS) for my master’s degree of Genetics (2010-2013).

item.title: External links
